name: PunkAnt with a Duct Tape
description:
Tired of being an Ant? Want to unleash your inner Spider to break all the rules and change the natural order of your colony and the whole ecosystem?

With Duct Tape, your dreams can become true! Whip it around, restrain your opponents for food or leave them for a late night snack! 

Reject Insect-ivity, become Arthropod!

Edit: Now in WebGL! :)

Credits:

Jorge Dias - Jormirias
Manuel A. Menezes - Space-Shoe

Music - Area12, Heavy in mood, and rocking Man is He Mega - GLBML, Chiptune Grooving, Angel Eyes (Chiptune Edit)
